column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) ), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: ITEM_ID
column.comment: The code of the item.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: ITEM_SDESC
column.comment: Short description.

column.name: ITEM_LDESC
column.comment: Long description

column.name: ITEM_TYPE
column.comment: The kind of item that is sold or provided in the RMS location. Valid values are 'E' - Equipment and 'L' - Labor.

column.name: TRACKING_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the item is tracked inventory or not. GL activities are not reported for non-tracked inventory items. If the ITEM_TYPE is 'L' (Labor), the item is never tracked inventory. If the ITEM_TYPE is 'E' (Equipment), it may or may not be tracked inventory.  If the SERIAL_TYPE is 'S' (Serialized, but not SIM Card or Handset) or 'E' (Sim Card) the TRACKING_IND must be 'Y'.

column.name: SERIAL_TYPE
column.comment: The type of the serial item.  Valid values are  E - SIM card,  H - handset,  P - package,  S - other serial,   V - voucher,  N - non serial  For phase II it will be  'E' only.

column.name: NUM_COUNTER
column.comment: This attribute defines the number of CTNs that can be connected to this ESN item. This field is informational only, there is no check that the ESN is not assigned in the system to more CTNs that this number.  If the SERIAL_TYPE is not 'H', the value must be 'zero'. If the SERIAL_TYPE is 'H', it is one or more. Not in use in MMO

column.name: MANF_CD
column.comment: The code of the manufacturer.

column.name: CORPORATE_ITEM_ID
column.comment: The code of the item in the corporate (info only). A valid Item_Id.

column.name: UNIT_TYPE
column.comment: The type of the item. (info only). Valid values are 'I' - Installed, 'P'- Portable and 'T'- Transportable.

column.name: ACCOUNTING_METHOD
column.comment: Define the accounting method for the item.  'V' - Track Value 'E' - Report as Expense 'N' - No Accounting

column.name: UPC
column.comment: universal product code

column.name: ALL_LOCATIONS_IND
column.comment: An indicator in order to specify if the item is being sold in a partner agent location.

column.name: SIM_TYPE
column.comment: The code of the SIM type.

column.name: PACKAGE_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the item is a package 'Y' or regular item 'N'.

column.name: PACKAGE_PRICE_IND
column.comment: When the value is 'P' the price is taken from the item, when the value is 'U', the price is a summary of each unit in the package.

column.name: NUMBER_OF_SN_IN_PCK
column.comment: The number of the different serial items in the package.

column.name: VOUCHER_TYPE
column.comment: Voucher type - gift or regular. Valid values: "VC"

column.name: EU_VOUCHER_AMT
column.comment: The amount in Euro printed on the voucher.

column.name: PP_PACKAGE_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the item is a package 'Y' or regular item 'N'.

column.name: NDC
column.comment: National Destination Code (Die Vorwahl einer Telefonnummer)

column.name: HLR
column.comment: Angabe, fuer welches HLR die bestellten SIM-Karten sind. Die HLR (Home Location Register

column.name: SIM_LOCK_IND
column.comment: SIM lock indicator. Indicates whether the item is a SIM locak package (contains a subsidized handset).
